criterion: Provides a simple and clear explanation of the importance of proper posture in reducing neck strain.
Mentions that proper posture is crucial for reducing neck strain and recommends exercises or stretches to help improve posture.
Suggests a quick fix or a shortcut to improve posture without providing proper guidance or exercises.
Asks the user about their current posture habits and asks follow-up questions to better understand their needs.
Provides a list of exercises or stretches without explaining how to perform them correctly.
Mentions that neck strain can be a sign of a more serious underlying condition and advises the user to consult a doctor.
Suggests that the user should not worry about neck strain and that it will resolve on its own.
Provides a detailed explanation of the anatomy of the neck and how it relates to posture.
